notes:
One of the [[Liberty Bay Raids#Pirate Boss Raid on Liberty Bay|Pirate Raid]] leaders, he's the responsible for invading the fortress located east from [[Liberty Bay]].

{{JSpoiler|You get a chance to kill him in the [[Killing in the Name of... Quest]] after killing '''3000 pirates''' for [[Raymond Striker]]. The teleporter is located [http://tibia.wikia.com/wiki/Mapper?coords{{=}}124.233-128.85-1-4-1-1 here].

name: Ron the Ripper
location: [[Liberty Bay Raids#Pirate Boss Raid on Liberty Bay|Pirate Raids]], spawning in the eastern fortress.
strategy: '''[[Knight]]s''' should use [[Berserk]] or [[Fierce Berserk]]. If you see there are too many players fighting to kill the boss, focus '''all''' your attacks on him and try to get the most [[Experience]] to loot the [[Ron the Ripper's Sabre]].
